sentences.english: He tried to pick a quarrel with me about it but I refused to discuss the matter.
sentences.chinese: 他极力想就那事找我的茬儿，但我绝不谈论此事。

sentences.english: The paper gives the design of the narrow pitch and lower stubble cutting apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 据此提出了窄节距低割茬切割器的设计依据。

sentences.english: He always likes to find faults with other people.
sentences.chinese: 他总是喜欢找别人的茬。

sentences.english: She's always carping at her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她老是在找她丈夫的茬儿。

sentences.english: The re-growth of alfalfa with white flower had difference in different cutting.
sentences.chinese: 同一品系白花苜蓿不同茬次的再生速度存在差异。

sentences.english: Now that they have gathered in the crops, the farmers are burning off the stubble in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 既然庄稼已收割，农民们正在烧掉地里的茬儿。

sentences.english: After cropping cotton crops before harvest, irrigation based on moisture content or not.
sentences.chinese: 两熟棉区在前茬作物收获后，根据墒情确定灌溉与否。

sentences.english: She always found fault with him no matter what he did.
sentences.chinese: 不管他做什么，她总是找他的茬儿。

sentences.english: I want to by your side.
The rosette disease of millet spreaded rapidly in Wuwei area Gansu province in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 谷子坐茬是武威地区近年来新蔓延起来的一种病害。

sentences.english: But stubble lacks the finer taper of unshaven hair, giving the impression of coarseness .
sentences.chinese: 但是，未刮净的汗毛茬会给人以粗糙的感觉。

sentences.english: Written on the face does not matter, mouth talking do not care, in fact, was very concerned about.
sentences.chinese: 脸仩写著无所谓，嘴仩詤著钚茬乎，其实惢里很茬意。

sentences.english: Written on the face does not matter, mouth talking do not care, in fact, was very concerned about.
sentences.chinese: 脸仩写著无所谓，嘴仩詤著钚茬乎，其实惢里很茬意。
